id.description: String to identify the quest. This string is used by the scene to reference the quest. If no id is provided, the server will generate one.

name.description: Name that appears in the quests menu and on the quest progress UI

description.description: Description that appears in the quests menu, when opening the quest’s details

thumbnailEntry.description: String with a URL to an image to display in the quest menu and the quest progress UI. The image should be 122x122 pixels. Make sure you host this image in a location that has a CORS configuration that allows showing the content in Decentraland.

thumbnailBanner.description: String with a URL to an image to display in the quest menu, when opening the quest’s details. The image should be 390x170 pixels. Make sure you host this image in a location that has a CORS configuration that allows showing the content in Decentraland

active.description: When true the Quest is active

tasks.description: The list of task's states that make up the quest.

requirements.description: Conditions that must be met by the player before the quest can be started

rewards.description: The IDs of any rewards to associate to completing all of the tasks in the quest. Use the rewards endpoint first to create a reward, then use this field to assign an already created reward.

givenRewards.description: List of given rewards to players
